Documentation.short_help: Interpolates a line on a point or cell mesh.

SourceProxy.Documentation:
This filter works in a similar way to the plot over line filter. It interpolates a line on a point or cell mesh and returns the interpolated variables.
Produces an output using the OGS Vertical Profile Plot.
